text: 21:27 Aisaia 35:8; 52:1; 60:21; Esekiel 44:9; Joel 3:17; 1 Korin 6:9-10; Filipai 4:3; Akar Mogomem 13:8; 20:12; 21:8; 22:14-15Eghtɨ bizir mɨzɨrɨziba ko gumazamizir arazir kurigha mughazibagh amiba ko, gumazamizir ifavariba, me nguibar ekiar kamɨn aven mangan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham, gumazamizir ziaba akɨnafarir zurara itimɨn aven itiba, akɨnafarir kam a Sipsipɨn Nguzimɨn akɨnafarim, merara nguibar ekiar kamɨn aven mangam.
